name: Tartine au Sucre
description: Tartine au sucre is an exquisitely simple rustic Québécois dessert consisting of thick slices of white bread topped with maple sugar and heavy cream.
keywords: dessert, heavy cream, maple sugar, maple white bread
recipeIngredient: 4 slices maple white bread, each about 1 1/2 inches thick (see recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Place a slice of bread on each of four plates and sprinkle heavily with maple sugar.
Whip the cream until it begins to hold its shape but can still be poured. Fold in the sour cream. Top each serving with the cream.
